attributes.action: Stop the resale of tickets for music and sporting events by ticket touts
attributes.additional_details:
Erasure gig tickets being sold for £127 when the face value is £37.50
https://www.viagogo.co.uk/Concert-Tickets/Rock-and-Pop/Erasure-Tickets/E-2222703
attributes.background: I'm fed up with trying to buy tickets to see my favourite bands at a ridiculously inflated price by companies that buy for major profits
